message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value item. I'm looking for $1500000 for it. Would you be interested?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $1300000. How about we meet in the middle at $1250000?
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I can do $1280000, but I'm getting closer to my minimum price. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm close to my budget, but I think we can do better than $1280000. How about $1220000?
